00023         bool HandlerMap::contains(eventid_t::value_typeref eventid)
00024         {
00025             boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(_lock);
00026             return _handlers.find(eventid) != _handlers.end();
00027         }
00028 
00029         void HandlerMap::addEventHandler(eventid_t::value_typeref eventid,
00030                                          handler_t handler)
00031         {
00032             Handler_ptr ev = Handler_ptr(new Handler());
00033             ev->handler = handler;
00034             boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(_lock);
00035             _handlers[eventid] = ev;
00036         }
00037 
00038         void HandlerMap::triggerEvent(socket::Facade_ptr facade,
00039                                       socket::Session_ptr session,
00040                                       Event_ptr event)
00041         {
00042             Handler_ptr handler;
00043             {
00044                 boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(_lock);
00045                 handler = _handlers[event->eventid()];
00046             }
00047             handler->handler(facade, session, event);
00048         }
00049

00051 
00052         void simpleAllEventsHandler(event::HandlerMap_ptr eventHandlerMap,
00053                                     socket::Facade_ptr facade,
00054                                     socket::Session_ptr session,
00055                                     Event_ptr event)
00056         {
00057             //std::cerr << "Handling event: " << event->eventid() << std::endl;
00058             if(eventHandlerMap->contains(event->eventid()))
00059             {
00060                 //std::cerr << "Event " << event->eventid() << " has a handler!" << std::endl;
00061                 eventHandlerMap->triggerEvent(facade, session, event);
00062             }
00063             else
00064             {
00065                 throw std::runtime_error("No event handler for eventid " +
00066                                          boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(event->eventid()));
00067             }
00068         }
